statements: SELECT * FROM scheduling_and_appointments;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_specialty FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-03-10';
SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, appointment_time FROM scheduling_and_appointments ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE patient_id = 123 AND doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT * FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Neurology' ORDER BY appointment_time, appointment_date;
SELECT DISTINCT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM scheduling_and_appointments;
SELECT * FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-05-20' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_time DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, gender DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, gender, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor FROM Appointments WHERE status='Scheduled';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors WHERE hospital = 'ABC Hospital';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor FROM Appointments WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_time, patient_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM schedules GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 1 ORDER BY appointment_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments, MAX(appointment_time) AS latest_appointment FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_time;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_location FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='M' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Appointments.appointment_date, Doctors.doctor_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis IS NOT NULL;

SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Clinics.clinic_name, Appointments.appointment_date, Appointments.appointment_time FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id INNER JOIN Clinics ON Doctors.doctor_location = Clinics.clinic_location ORDER BY Appointments.appointment_date ASC, Appointments.appointment_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(Patients.patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), Patients.patient_dob)/365) AS avg_age FROM Patients WHERE Patients.patient_gender = 'F';
